extends AbstractEntity
    Class used for making projectiles.

    Johan Fredin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(float x,
      float y,
      float width,
      float height,
      float speed,
      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body,
      boolean isMovementReversed)
        Creates a new bullet and sets it moving immediately.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the bullet.
        y - The y position of the bullet.
        width - The width of the bullet.
        height - The height of the bullet.
        speed - The speed of the bullet.
        body - The box2D object that fired the bullet.
        isMovementReversed - Sets the bullet to go forward or backward.
